metadata.title: Donut Dog Bed, Faux Fur Washable Bed for Cats and Medium Dog, Marshmellow Cat Dog Round Bed, Calming Self Warming Cuddler Dog Bed, 28 inch, Deep Grey
features: Fluffy Faux Fur: Luxurious faux fur made of premium quality fabric, fluffy furry plush brings your pets a feeling of cuddler, helps them sleep faster and reduce anxiety. Then inner was filling of PP cotton, soft and lightweight.
Neck Supportive Trim: The higher trim on the edge was thoughtfully designed to provide a support for your pets' neck and heads, creates a sense of security and comfort.
Watert Resistant & Anti Slip Bottom: The dots on the bottom can effectively prevent the donut bed from wandering in the house, stay in place all the time when your lovely friends on it.

Choose Your Size: 20 inches pet bed is for cats or dogs ups to 15 lbs; 28 inches pet bed is for dogs ups to 38 lbs, also can be used for two small pets. Also, the round cat dog bed was so fit for pets' naturally lying position.

Machine Washable: No zippers to fuzz with, just put it to the washing machine, gentle cycle, tumble dry and low heat, save your time and trouble. Buy today and get a 100% money-back guarantee within 30 days.
description: Material: Outer, plush.  Inner, PP cotton.Outer diameter: 20 inch for 15 lbs pets; 28 inch for 38lbs pets or two small pets.
Due to its lightweight and compressible, it can be used in your home, in a car , in a pinic or in a trip. Let your lovely friends rest and relax anywhere without any effort!

Thanks to its round shape, our high-quality Donut Cuddler dog and cat bed is ideal for pets who love to curl up! The raised rim creates a sense of security and provides head and neck support, while the super-soft filling offers joint and muscle pain relief.
